overview: Did you ever wanna sniff around in your girlfriend's panty drawer? Well, here's your chance! Hot female director Emily Rigby lets you in on her girlfriend's deepest, darkest secrets... WAY beyond Victoria's!  Rigby has done it again and struck it big with My Personal Panties 2 with new girls, including Eden Adams, Jodi Bean and Krista Kaslo, straight off the street ready to bare it all for you!
title: My Personal Panties 2
